issue.title: qa: Intermittent failures in the psbt_wallet_tests/psbt_updater_test unit test

events.body: Looks like a race where the wallet is deleted before the scheduler thread exits and flushes all events?

~I've bisected it down to #23336.~

UPDATE. See #23403.

> I've bisected it down to #23336.

If this is intermittent, how did you bisect? If there are steps to reproduce, then it would be good to run in valgrind to debug the segmentation fault.

I couldn't reproduce this locally yet.

> If this is intermittent, how did you bisect?

By looping `make check` :tiger2:

Yes, as I said before this looks like a race where the wallet is deleted before stopping the scheduler: https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/issues/23368#issuecomment-952808824

IIRC, the order should be:

* stop scheduler
* delete wallet
* delete scheduler

<details><summary>Reproduced locally in valgrind</summary>

```diff
diff --git a/src/scheduler.cpp b/src/scheduler.cpp
index 162cced6c7..fa1864822f 100644
--- a/src/scheduler.cpp
+++ b/src/scheduler.cpp
@@ -57,6 +57,7 @@ void CScheduler::serviceQueue()
             Function f = taskQueue.begin()->second;
             taskQueue.erase(taskQueue.begin());
 
+    UninterruptibleSleep(10ms);
             {
                 // Unlock before calling f, so it can reschedule itself or another task
                 // without deadlocking:
diff --git a/src/wallet/test/wallet_test_fixture.cpp b/src/wallet/test/wallet_test_fixture.cpp
index fc744ebe5b..c9cecdb15c 100644
--- a/src/wallet/test/wallet_test_fixture.cpp
+++ b/src/wallet/test/wallet_test_fixture.cpp
@@ -8,7 +8,11 @@ WalletTestingSetup::WalletTestingSetup(const std::string& chainName)
     : TestingSetup(chainName),
       m_wallet(m_node.chain.get(), "", CreateMockWalletDatabase())
 {
+    UninterruptibleSleep(10ms);
     m_wallet.LoadWallet();
+    UninterruptibleSleep(10ms);
     m_chain_notifications_handler = m_node.chain->handleNotifications({ &m_wallet, [](CWallet*) {} });
+    UninterruptibleSleep(10ms);
     m_wallet_client->registerRpcs();
+    UninterruptibleSleep(10ms);
 }
```

```
while ( make &&  valgrind ./src/test/test_bitcoin -t psbt_wallet_tests --catch_system_errors=no -l test_suite -- DEBUG_LOG_OUT ) ; do true ; done
```
